actions.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 151 (Roll no. 374).

description: Amendment makes various technical changes in addition to clarifing or adding certain allowable uses of funds, clarifing the Act's green building requirements, and adding certain reporting requirements.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-678 to makin various technical changes in addition to clarifing or adding certain allowable uses of funds, clarifing the Act's green building requirements, and adding certain reporting requirements.
